text: Yemwe abemeye! Mujye muhagarara mwemye (mwuzuza inshingano zanyu) kubera Allah, kandi mujye muba abahamya batabogama, ndetse urwango abantu babafitiye ntiruzatume mutabagirira ubutabera. Mujye murangwa n’ubutabera kuko ari byo byegereye kugandukira Allah, kandi mugandukire Allah. Mu by’ukuri, Allah azi neza ibyo mukora
